headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Players can get 30% off the Coil Rocket Voltic, 40% off the Declasse Weaponized Tampa and the HVY Nightshark. There is also a range of other vehicles on sale this week, including:

- Karin Sultan RS Classic – 40% off
- Pegassi Torero – 50% off
- Karin Technical Aqua – 40% off
- Emperor ETR1 – 40% off

Head to the LS Car Meet to tune up your purchased vehicle or go to the Modding Bay of the Auto Shop.

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
